entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the evening. Wind east 30 km/h becoming light in the evening. Wind becoming west 40 gusting to 60 before morning. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023
